title: Joe Biden refers to president as ‘Donald Hump’ in ‘Freudian slip’
text:
‘I believe history will look back in this presidency as an aberrant moment in time but If Donald Hump…Donald Trump is re-elected. Freudian slip.’ Joe Biden

Democratic presidential candidate Joe Biden on Saturday referred to President Donald Trump as “Donald Hump,” during a speech at the New Hampshire Democratic Party Convention.

The former vice president to President Barack Obama and current front-runner to gain the 2020 Democratic nomination against Republican incumbent Trump, has made a number of notable gaffes recently, leading Biden to refer to himself as the “gaffe machine.”

“But here’s the deal. Any gaffe that I have made — and I’ve made gaffes just like any politician I know has — have been not about a substantive issue,” Biden said in an interview on the Late Show with Stephen Colbert earlier this week.
